title: @Riot Skin creation process questions
body:
- Does the process start with a skin idea or a "this champ needs a skin" thought?
- What causes you to decide one champ is worthy of a skin over another?
- Is there some bank of ideas for skins/general skin concepts that you pull from?
- Is there any sort of schedule for who gets a skin next or is it simply based on what feels best?

lastly.. how come warwick who has had many skins got to be part of the marauder/warden release but Diana couldn't be a part of it? I feel it would thematically work for her.. woulda been so cool..
Thanks so much for your hard work regardless, skin quality has gone way up IMO
